title: How to Repair a Warped Debit or Credit Card

steps.title: Don't fret.
steps.content: Don't fret. The card can be repaired or replaced. [1] X Research source Try one or more of these methods first, then call the bank if the fix doesn't work.

steps.title: Gather your supplies; paper bag, iron, very flat surface.
steps.content: Gather your supplies; paper bag, iron, very flat surface. Try using a cutting board as your flat surface.

steps.title: Warm the iron on a low and dry setting.
steps.content: Warm the iron on a low and dry setting. About a level 2 heat setting is appropriate. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the debit/credit card just inside the paper bag.
steps.content: Place the debit/credit card just inside the paper bag. Lay both flat on the very flat surface.

steps.title: Aim for the magnetic swipe strip.
steps.content: Aim for the magnetic swipe strip. That's the only part of the card that absolutely needs flattening. Don't flatten the numbers!

steps.title: Get your aim dead on, press and continuously move the iron back and forth for 30 seconds or less.
steps.content: Get your aim dead on, press and continuously move the iron back and forth for 30 seconds or less. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Check your results.
steps.content: Check your results. Is your card flat? If not, repeat steps until the swipe section is flat.

steps.title: Find a hair dryer.
steps.content: Find a hair dryer. Place your card on a flat surface that can handle being heated up. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Heat up the card with the hair dryer.
steps.content: Heat up the card with the hair dryer. When warmed up, bend the card in the direction it needs to go to flatten again. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Place the card between the flat surface and a heavy object, such as a large book or other flat object.
steps.content: Place the card between the flat surface and a heavy object, such as a large book or other flat object. Use the heavy item to hold it down.

steps.title: Leave for a short time to flatten the card.
steps.content: Leave for a short time to flatten the card. Remove the card and it should be flat again.
